page.title: 15SAXONDALE
page.content: Saxondale is a village near to Bingham. It is a short distance along the A52 towards Nottingham. Its name means{'The Valley of the Saxons'. { }Nowadays there is a hospital in Saxondale for mentally handicapped people. There are three farms in the village, two of which are concerned with mixed farming and the other is an arable farm. There are boarding kennels which take in cats and dogs and where they also breed Labradors,Chow-chows, Airedales and West Highland Terriers. The children from Saxondale go to school in Bingham.
